# AddCustomProperty

**Instance Method**

Adds a custom property to the audio object.

## Declaration

```swift
kern_return_t AddCustomProperty(IOUserAudioCustomProperty * in_custom_property);
```

## Parameters

- **in_custom_property**: An [doc://com.apple.audiodriverkit/documentation/AudioDriverKit/IOUserAudioCustomProperty] object to add to the [doc://com.apple.audiodriverkit/documentation/AudioDriverKit/IOUserAudioObject].

## Return Value

[doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/DriverKit/kIOReturnSuccess] on success, or another value if an error occurs. For a list of error codes, see [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/DriverKit/error-codes].

## Using Custom Properties

- **RemoveCustomProperty**: Removes a previously-added custom property object from the audio object.
- **IOUserAudioCustomProperty**: A custom property to associate with audio objects.
